para.para.body: This method is particularly effective if we have to solve several systems of linear equations each of which has the same coefficient matrix: We only need to invert the coefficient matrix once. If afterward a new augmentation vector is given, we can find the unique solution of the resulting system of linear equations with a simple matrix multiplication.
